title: 字母异位词分组 (Group Anagrams)
content: 思路: // @Title: 字母异位词分组 (Group Anagrams) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-05-10 23:20:15 // @Runtime: 7 ms // @Memory: 46.6 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public List<List<String>> groupAnagrams(String[] strs) { Map<String,List<String>> hash=new HashMap<>(); for(String str:strs){ String order=ordered(str); List<String> list=hash.getOrDefault(order,new ArrayList<>()); list.add(str);hash.put(order,list); } List<List<String>> result=new ArrayList<>(); for(String key:hash.keySet()){ result.add(hash.get(key)); } return result; } private String ordered(String str){ char[] temp=str.toCharArray(); Arrays.sort(temp); return new String(temp); } }
